name: i-librarian
tagline: A web-based reference and document manager for researchers with PDF storage and citations
description: I Librarian is a web based reference and document manager for researchers. It stores PDFs, annotations and bibliographic data, supports full text search and citation export, and can be deployed as a private literature database.

features.title: Reference Management
features.description: Provides a personal system for organizing academic papers and research references in a structured library

features.title: PDF Storage
features.description: Stores PDF files directly alongside reference records for centralized access

features.title: Metadata Editing
features.description: Allows users to edit bibliographic metadata such as authors titles abstracts and keywords

features.title: Search and Filtering
features.description: Enables searching and filtering of references using metadata fields and document content

features.title: Tagging
features.description: Supports categorization of references using user-defined tags

features.title: Citation Export
features.description: Exports references into common citation formats for use in external tools

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Provides browser-based access to manage and review the reference library

features.title: Self-Hosted Library
features.description: Allows the reference manager to be hosted on your own servers
